rub_translation_lid.description: Rub the lid of the bottle to remove any dirt.

shift_bottle_via_lid.description: Move the bottle by lifting it by its lid.

inspect_lid.description: Review the status of the lid translation on the bottle.

clean_bottle_lid.description: Clean the translational lid of the bottle to remove any dust or particles.

press_bottle_lid.description: Press down on the bottle's translational lid.

lift_bottle_by_lid.description: Lift the bottle using the lid.

clean_lid_v2.description: Wipe the bottle's translational lid to ensure it is free of dust.

press_lid_v2.description: Push down on the bottle's lid using pressing action.

status_check.description: Check if the lid translation of the bottle is complete.

clean_lid.description: Clean the translation lid of the bottle to remove any dust or particles.

press_lid.description: Press the translation lid of the bottle down.

feel_bottle_material.description: Feel the texture of the bottle body by pressing it.

clean_bottle_body_surface.description: Wipe the fixed body of the bottle to remove any dirt.

place_bottle_at_new_spot.description: Relocate the bottle by lifting and placing it at a new spot.

spin_bottle_for_inspection.description: Twist the bottle around its axis for full inspection.

press_bottle_surface.description: Press the body of the bottle to check its hardness.

clean_bottle_surface.description: Clean the body of the bottle to remove any dust or particles.

move_bottle_to_new_location.description: Relocate the bottle to a new location.

press_bottle_body_v2.description: Apply pressure to the bottle body to assess its integrity.

rotate_bottle.description: Turn the bottle to inspect the entire surface area.

change_bottle_location.description: Lift and place the bottle in the desired location.

wipe_bottle_body_v2.description: Wipe the bottle body to ensure cleanliness.

move_bottle.description: Pick the bottle up and place it to a new location.

press_bottle_body.description: Press the body of the bottle to check its toughness.

rotate_bottle_seconds.description: Rotate the bottle to view its different sides.

wipe_bottle_body.description: Wipe the fixed body of the bottle to clean it.

clean_whole_bottle.description: Wipe the entire bottle comprising both the lid and the body.

shift_bottle_to_new_position.description: Pick up the bottle and place it at a new position.

sponsor_bottle_overhaul.description: Rotate both the body and the lid of the bottle for examination.

complete_bottle_surface_cleaning.description: Clean entire bottle starting with the lid and then the body.

full_bottle_relocation.description: Move the complete bottle to a new location.

entire_bottle_cleaning.description: Remove foreign material from the bottle lid followed by the body.

move_bottle_v3.description: Pick and place the bottle at its new desired location.

complete_bottle_rotation.description: Rotate the entire bottle for comprehensive inspection.

full_bottle_move.description: Move the entire bottle by picking and placing.

clean_bottle_v2.description: Clean the entire bottle, first clean the lid and then handle the body.

move_bottle_v2.description: Move the entire bottle, first pick up the bottle and then put it back.

clean_bottle.description: Clean the entire bottle including lid and body.

drag_bottle.description: Drag the bottle to another place.
